latlon2map 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference
  • Articles
    • Removing the boring parts from geocomputation with European data

Regions and provinces in Italy (high detail, CC-BY Istat)

ll_get_nuts_it.Rd

2019 / WGS84 UTM32N

ll_get_nuts_it(
  name = NULL,
  level = 2,
  year = 2021,
  resolution = "low",
  silent = FALSE
)

Arguments

level

Defaults to "2", i.e. regioni. Available: "3" (i.e. province), and "lau", local administrative units.
year

Defaults to 2021 (latest available).

Value

Examples

ll_set_folder("~/R/")

#> [1] "~/R/"
ll_get_nuts_it()
